= Bed2genetsv =

== Format ==
cg bed2genetsv ?infile? ?outfile?

== Summary ==
Converts data in bed12 format to the [[tsv]] [[gene]] format

== Arguments ==
; **infile**: file to be converted, if not given, uses stdin. File may be compressed.
; **outfile**: write results to outfile, if not given, uses stdout

== Category ==
Format Conversion
